sentences.sContent: This beatitude is as vast as the Bible itself.
sentences.sContent_eng: This beatitude is as vast as the Bible itself.
sentences.sCn: 这个祝福，如同圣经本身一样广阔。

sentences.sContent: This beatitude encompasses the whole message of the Bible.
sentences.sContent_eng: This beatitude encompasses the whole message of the Bible.
sentences.sCn: 这个祝福，盖括了整本圣经的信息。

sentences.sContent: I think that if I were allowed to add one small beatitude as a footnote to the other it might be: Blessed are the courteous .
sentences.sContent_eng: I think that if I were allowed to add one small beatitude as a footnote to the other it might be: Blessed are the courteous .
sentences.sCn: 我想如果允许我在《圣经》中用脚注加上一小句祝福的话，那么这句话就是：“礼貌者有福。”
